Brothers and sisters, we decided to hold an extended ministerial retreat in the coming weeks in the presence of local governments and economists to discuss the post-oil economy of the UAE

We will celebrate the last barrel we export from oil, as my brother Mohammed bin Zayed said, and we will begin to develop a comprehensive national program to achieve this vision and a sustainable economy for future generations
Today, 70% of our national economy is not dependent on oil and our goal is to achieve a new equation for our economy that is not dependent on oil or dependent on market fluctuations

We will add new economic sectors .. We will improve the efficiency and productivity of the current sectors .. We will prepare generations able to lead a national economy sustainable and balanced, God willing
Kristaps Porzingis #NBAVote

We will embark on a ministerial retreat together with government officials and economists to discuss moving the UAE economy beyond oil.
Celebrating the last barrel of oil, as my brother Mohammed bin Zayed has said, we will build a sustainable economy for future generations.
Today, our economy consists of a non-oil GDP of 70%. We will build an economy that is independent of oil and market fluctuations alike.
We will add new growth areas, create efficiencies and build productivity. We will prepare our youth to lead a sustainable, balanced economy.

Members of the Military Council shall be appointed on the proposal of the Minister of National Defense on the basis of Articles 23, 24 and 26 of the Defense Act and not on the basis of quotas

We did not and will not require the naming of one of the two members in return for acceptance of the second name, we have been and continue to demand respect for the mechanism and standards and the removal of the military from the tug

Israel is a place where there is freedom of worship for Christians and all religions, and the only place in the Middle East where the Christian population has grown. The police is working to find those responsible.

Today, we hosted a UN delegation headed by the UN Secretary-General to launch an international report on bridging the global humanitarian assistance gap https://t.co/q0vYMe0uUg
There is a gap of $ 15 billion in international humanitarian action that kills tens of millions, and real international cooperation is needed to bridge that gap

The UAE is the world's first humanitarian aid as a percentage of its national income and we will remain a humanitarian capital supportive of everything that would preserve the right to a decent life for human beings

I chose Kamwokya & Kisenyi, Mengo to start & end my rallies in K'la. I want the citizens living here to know the #GoForward plans for dev't
I have moved around the Country and have seen the state of our economy, healthcare and the important sectors to the people like agriculture.
I have spoken on key issues in the manifesto. I believe that I have key skill set to move Uganda forward. Knowledge acquired over the years.
If you find yourself in a bad situation, you must do something about it. You have the power to change that situation through your vote.
As a candidate I and the TDA(U) Go Forward alliance will do our best to protect your vote.
Our team start protecting your vote when we sent our representative to Cape Town to ensure that printing of ballot papers is transparent.
We'll continue to protect the vote here in Kampala. Your task as citizens is to cast your vote and our task is to work to protect that vote.
Today, along with my brother Mohammed bin Zayed and UAE guests, I witnessed the events of the Future Energy Summit in Abu Dhabi .. https://t.co/dBBmsGVhCz
Abu Dhabi's international capital is gathering momentum to bring decision-makers together with international organizations and the private sector to find solutions to future global energy challenges

The UAE is directly concerned with the challenges of global energy, research, investment, innovation and industrialization of international policies, and no sustainable development without sustainable energy.
